text: The Ceylon Electricity Board is a public company that provides an immense service to the people. However the most important point is that the CEP functions on public funds. Therefore the minister of Power and Energy Patali Champika Ranawaka said that since the CEB functions on public funds we must provide the people a friendly and courteous service. The minister made these comments at the opening of the E city office in the Gampola town.
title: Another E city opens in Gampola for the convenience of consumers.
